# [Interview #189: ComicCon Wrap-Up - Jason Denzel, Entry #6](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=189#6)

#### Robert Jordan

His definition of a Hero is a person who keeps going, no matter what, despite being afraid.
